snippet: HARRISON--Jim. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our colleague, the distinguished novelist, poet and essayist whose love of the good life matched his love of literature. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HARRISON--Jim. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our colleague, the distinguished novelist, poet and essayist whose love of the good life matched his love of literature. 1/3
